process.sql: select dt, device_id, sum(click_num) as click_num_sum, sum(sight_show_num) as sight_show_num_sum, sum(click_num) / sum(sight_show_num) as ctr from gdm.gdm_04_app_rcmd_di where dt='${BASE_DATE_10}' group by dt, device_id
select dt, device_id, count(distinct pvid) as brush_num from gdm.gdm_04_app_rcmd_di where dt='${BASE_DATE_10}' group by dt, device_id
select a.dt, a.device_id, click_num_sum, sight_show_num_sum, ctr, brush_num from TMP_TBL_01 a join TMP_TBL_02 b on a.dt = b.dt and a.device_id = b.device_id
insert overwrite table cmp_tmp.cmp_tmp_user_ctr PARTITION(dt)  select device_id,ctr,click_num_sum as click_num,sight_show_num_sum as sight_show_num,brush_num,dt from TMP_TBL_03
